body_html:
Agreed, it is weird - inspection of the source code didn't reveal any obvious issue (though I'm not really familiar with torch internals).

Is there anything in the error suggesting cudnn is not detected? For what it's worth, I am fairly confident it was detected, as torch.backends.cudnn.enabled returned true. I wanted cudnn since I want to squeeze as much performance out as possible of this thing, and I had to compile the source code a few times before getting it right (in effect, I did have to set up the env vars at compile time).

body:
Agreed, it is weird - inspection of the source code didn't reveal any obvious issue (though I'm not really familiar with torch internals). 

Is there anything in the error suggesting cudnn is not detected? For what it's worth, I am fairly confident it was detected, as `torch.backends.cudnn.enabled` returned true. I wanted cudnn since I want to squeeze as much performance out as possible of this thing, and I had to compile the source code a few times before getting it right (in effect, I did have to set up the env vars at compile time).
